A smart dog leash with GPS tracking and a panic button. This leash would allow dog owners to track their pet's location and movement in real-time, ensuring their safety and peace of mind. The panic button would allow the owner to quickly alert emergency services in case of an emergency.

A smart dog leash with a built-in water bottle and bowl. This leash would provide a convenient and hygienic way for dogs to drink water while on a walk, eliminating the need for owners to carry water bottles or bowls. The water bottle would be designed to attach to the leash and be easily accessible to the dog.

A dog leash with a built-in music player and speaker. This leash would allow owners to play music or podcasts for their dogs during walks, providing mental stimulation and entertainment. The speaker would be waterproof and durable, ensuring that it can withstand the elements and rough handling by the dog.

A dog leash with a built-in first aid kit. This leash would include a small pouch or compartment that contains basic first aid supplies, such as bandages, antiseptic wipes, and pain relievers. This would be useful in case the dog suffers an injury or illness during a walk.

A dog leash with a built-in fitness tracker. This leash would track the dog's exercise and activity levels during walks, providing owners with valuable information on their pet's fitness and health. The tracker could also monitor the dog's heart rate and other vital signs, providing real-time feedback to the owner. This would allow owners to monitor their dog's health and make any necessary adjustments to their exercise routine.
